PersonPublicProfile.name: PersonPublicProfile
PersonPublicProfile.description: Represents information about a user thatâ€™s shown on their public profile.

AboutMe.description: The description provided by the user for their public profile.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Person Public Profile

FirstPublished.description: When this profile was first published.

PersonPublicProfilePrefSetId.description: The preferences set by the user, which determine what information to show on their public profile.

PrimaryCredentialName.description: The name of the most recent credential.

PrimaryCredentialType.description: Specifies the type of primary credential, such as the type of associated academic credential.

PrimaryCredentialYear.description: The year of the most recent credential based on the created date.

Pronouns.description: Specifies the preferred gender pronoun for the user.

UsageType.description: Specifies the type of site that the sharing settings are applied to. Possible values include Alumni and Student.

Website.description: A website that's associated with the person.
